attributes.title: SEO Specialist
attributes.subTitle: Work on the execution of external and internal optimization of the site
attributes.cardDescription: RemotEmployees is looking for an SEO expert with knowledge of the English language (B2+ at least) to work on internal and external website optimization.Got the hang of optimization and website promotion? Our company, RemotEmployees, presents an opportunity to develop in Marketing and IT in the capacity of an SEO specialist.
